ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Horn?
ygData.msgSnippet: The mino horn is a wind instrument and adds 15% over a regular wind instrument to wind songs. go here: http://eqsongs.com/Instruments.htm for a full list of
ygData.messageBody:
The mino horn is a wind instrument and adds 15% over a regular wind
instrument to wind songs.

go here: http://eqsongs.com/Instruments.htm for a full list of known
instruments.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Qaelan [mailto:qaelan@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 6:37 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Magical Horn?
>
>
> I know from speaking to some bards in game (i am only level
> 13) that there are some magical instruments that give added
> benefits to songs when used... While fighting in steamfont,
> we killed a slaver while looking for a minotaur axe. The
> slaver had a minotaur horn which it says a bard can use... my
> question is does this horn have any magical song effect to
> it? ie does it make songs better, or is it just a normal
> horn... Also, does anyone know what skill this uses, brass or
> wind, or something else?
>
> Thanks in advance for your help
>
> Rueveyan
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
